WorkspaceInstanceId.description: ID of the workspace instance to associate with the volume
WorkspaceInstanceId.markdownDescription:
ID of the workspace instance to associate with the volume

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^wsinst-[0-9a-zA-Z]{8,63}$  
Update requires: Replacement

VolumeId.description: ID of the volume to attach to the workspace instance
VolumeId.markdownDescription:
ID of the volume to attach to the workspace instance

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^vol-[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,63}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Device.description: The device name for the volume attachment
Device.markdownDescription:
The device name for the volume attachment

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 32  
Update requires: Replacement

DisassociateMode.description: Mode to use when disassociating the volume
DisassociateMode.markdownDescription:
Mode to use when disassociating the volume

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FORCE | NO_FORCE  
Update requires: No interruption
